item.title: 中国称90%以上新能源汽车继续享受税收优惠
item.description:
More than 90% of China's existing new energy vehicle (NEV) models will continue to receive tax breaks on purchases, under new technical requirements unveiled on Monday, China's industry ministry said.翻译:中国工信部表示，根据周一公布的新技术要求，中国现有 90% 以上的新能源汽车 (NEV) 车型将继续享受购置税减免。

The technical requirements for NEV eligibility for purchase tax exemptions from 2024 state that pure electric cars should have a driving range of at least 200 kilometres per charge while plug-in hybrid cars should be able to run at least 43 kilometres on electricity, the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology said in a statement.翻译:工信部发布的《2024年起新能源汽车免征购置税资格技术要求》规定，纯电动汽车一次充电续驶里程不少于200公里，插电式混合动力汽车一次充电续驶里程不少于43公里。工业和信息化部在一份声明中表示。

The new regulations require a range attenuation rate of no higher than 35% under low temperatures for electric vehicles (EVs), and allows EVs capable of battery swapping to be eligible for the tax breaks.翻译:新规定要求电动汽车在低温下的续航里程衰减率不高于35%，并允许可更换电池的电动汽车享受税收减免。

In June, China unveiled a 520 billion yuan ($72.41 billion)package of tax breaks over four years for EVs and other green cars, its biggest yet for the industry as it seeks to boost auto sales growth.翻译:6月，中国推出了四年内针对电动汽车和其他绿色汽车的5200亿元人民币（724.1亿美元）的税收减免计划，这是该行业迄今为止最大的税收减免计划，旨在促进汽车销售增长。

($1 = 7.1817 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.1817 人民币）

Reporting by Qiaoyi Li, Zhang Yan and Brenda Goh; Editing by Edmund Klamann翻译:李巧仪、张岩、Brenda Goh 报道；编辑：埃德蒙·克拉曼

item.title: 菲律宾称军事首领在遭水炮撞击的中国船只上
item.description:
Summary:
  • Manila accuses China of firing water cannons, ramming ship
  • Top Philippine military leader was aboard one ship
  • Marcos says China's actions illegal, violate international law
  • United States tells China to stop 'dangerous' conduct
翻译:概括：
  • 马尼拉指责中国发射水炮、冲撞船只
  • 菲律宾最高军事领导人登上一艘船
  • 马科斯称中国的行为非法，违反国际法
  • 美国要求中国停止“危险”行为

The Philippines on Monday called the actions of Chinese vessels against its boats - including one carrying a senior Philippine military official - carrying out South China Sea resupply missions over the weekend a "serious escalation".翻译:菲律宾周一称，中国船只对其周末在南海执行补给任务的船只——包括一艘载有菲律宾高级军事官员的船只——采取的行动是“严重升级”。

Manila has accused the Chinese coast guard and maritime militia of repeatedly firing water cannons at its resupply boats, causing "serious engine damage" to one, and "deliberately" ramming another. Philippine Chief of Staff of the Armed Forces Romeo Brawner said he was onboard a vessel that was both sprayed with a water cannon and rammed.翻译:马尼拉指责中国海警和海上民兵多次向其补给船发射高压水枪，造成其中一艘补给船“发动机严重损坏”，并“故意”撞击另一艘补给船。菲律宾武装部队参谋长罗密欧·布劳纳表示，他所乘坐的船只遭到水炮喷射和撞击。

"This is a serious escalation on the part of the agents of the People's Republic of China," Jonathan Malaya, spokesperson of the National Security Council, said in a news conference where officials showed images and videos of both the water cannons and ramming.翻译:国家安全委员会发言人乔纳森·马来亚在新闻发布会上表示，“中华人民共和国特工的行为严重升级”，官员们在会上展示了高压水枪和撞击的图像和视频。

Brawner told Philippine radio station DZBB that he was unhurt by the water cannon incident and that he does not believe China knew he was onboard the boat.翻译:布劳纳告诉菲律宾广播电台DZBB，他没有在水炮事件中受伤，并且他不相信中国知道他在船上。

The Philippines has filed diplomatic protests and has summoned China's ambassador over its "aggressive" actions in the South China Sea, which a foreign ministry official said were a "threat to peace, good order and security,"翻译:菲律宾已就其在南海的“侵略”行为提出外交抗议，并召见了中国大使，外交部官员称这些行为“对和平、良好秩序与安全构成威胁”。

China's use of water cannons against Philippine vessels undertaking resupply missions for troops on features Manila occupies in the South China Sea was not the first time it has done so.翻译:中国对在马尼拉占领的南海岛礁上执行部队补给任务的菲律宾船只使用高压水枪，这并不是第一次这样做。

The maritime confrontation between the Philippines and China during the weekend comes less than a month after leaders of both nations met at the sidelines of an economic summit in San Francisco to formulate ways forward in the South China Sea.翻译:菲律宾和中国周末发生海上对抗，距离两国领导人在旧金山举行的经济峰会期间会面，制定南海问题的解决方案不到一个月。

"There is a dissonance between what is being said and promised with what's happening in the waters," Foreign Ministry spokesperson Teresita Daza said in the same briefing.翻译:外交部发言人特雷西塔·达扎在同一份简报中表示：“所说的和承诺的与水域中发生的情况不一致。”

Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. has increasingly complained about China's "aggressive" behaviour, and he has sought closer ties with its treaty ally the United States.翻译:菲律宾总统小费迪南德·马科斯越来越多地抱怨中国的“侵略性”行为，并寻求与其条约盟友美国建立更密切的关系。

China claims sovereignty over nearly the entire South China Sea, pointing to a line on its maps that cuts into the exclusive economic zones of Vietnam, the Philippines, Malaysia, Brunei and Indonesia. Taiwan, which China also claims as part of its territory, has said it does not accept Beijing's maps.翻译:中国声称对几乎整个南海拥有主权，并指出其地图上有一条线切入了越南、菲律宾、马来西亚、文莱和印度尼西亚的专属经济区。中国也声称台湾是其领土的一部分，台湾已表示不接受北京的地图。

The Permanent Court of Arbitration in 2016 said the line on China's maps had no legal basis, a ruling the United States supports, but Beijing rejects.翻译:2016年，常设仲裁法院表示，中国地图上的这条线没有法律依据，美国支持这一裁决，但北京拒绝。

The United States has called out China for interfering in the Philippines' maritime operations and undermining regional stability, and urged Beijing to stop "its dangerous and destabilising conduct" in the strategic waters.翻译:美国指责中国干涉菲律宾的海上行动并破坏地区稳定，并敦促北京停止在战略海域“ 危险和破坏稳定的行为” 。

It reaffirmed its commitment to the mutual defence pact between the two countries, Matthew Miller, State Department Spokesperson said in a Dec. 10 statement.翻译:美国国务院发言人马修·米勒 (Matthew Miller) 在 12 月 10 日的声明中表示，它重申了对两国共同防御协定的承诺。

A commentary piece in China's official military newspaper urged the Philippines to immediately stop its violations, strictly control its provocative actions, and "refrain from shooting itself in the foot".翻译:中国官方军事报纸发表评论文章敦促菲律宾立即停止违法行为，严格控制挑衅行为，“不要搬起石头砸自己的脚”。

It added that "some hegemonic countries" have resorted to "instigating trouble, creating division and inciting confrontation" in the South China Sea, and that those countries "openly endorsed" illegal infringement and provocation by the Philippines.翻译:声明还称，“一些霸权国家”在南海搞“挑衅、制造分裂、煽动对抗”，这些国家“公然支持”菲律宾的非法侵犯和挑衅。

"It must be pointed out that the Philippines' actions are closely connected to the instigation and abetment of external forces," the PLA Daily said, without naming any country or government.翻译:《解放军报》说：“必须指出，菲律宾的行为与外部势力的煽动和教唆密切相关。”但没有点名任何国家或政府。

Malaya said China's claims that the United States is fuelling the Philippines' audacity for provocation have no basis and reiterated that the United States was not involved in resupply missions.翻译:马来亚表示，中国关于美国助长菲律宾大胆挑衅的说法毫无根据，并重申美国没有参与补给任务。

During the weekend, the Chinese coast guard said China would continue to carry out "law-enforcement activities" in its waters.翻译:周末期间，中国海警表示，中国将继续在其海域开展“执法活动”。

Marcos said that the presence of Chinese coast guard vessels and maritime militia in his country's waters is illegal and that their actions against Filipinos are outright violations of international law.翻译:马科斯表示，中国海警船只和海上民兵在菲律宾海域的存在是非法的，他们针对菲律宾人的行为公然违反了国际法。

"The aggression and provocations perpetrated by the China Coast Guard and their Chinese Maritime Militia... have only further steeled our determination to defend and protect our nation's sovereignty, sovereign rights, and jurisdiction in the West Philippine Sea," Marcos said on platform X late Sunday.翻译:马科斯在X平台上表示：“中国海警及其中国海上民兵的侵略和挑衅……只会进一步坚定我们捍卫和保护我们国家在西菲律宾海的主权、主权权利和管辖权的决心。”周日晚些时候。

Manila refers to the part of the South China Sea that it has exclusive economic rights as the West Philippine Sea.翻译:马尼拉将其拥有专属经济权利的南海部分称为西菲律宾海。

Reporting by Neil Jerome Morales and Mikhail Flores, and Liz Lee in Beijing; Editing by Kanupriya Kapoor and Gerry Doyle翻译:Neil Jerome Morales 和 Mikhail Flores 以及 Liz Lee 在北京的报道；卡努普里亚·卡普尔和格里·多伊尔编辑
item.author: Mikhail Flores, Karen Lema

item.title: 巴布亚新几内亚总理马拉佩表示不会与中国就安全问题进行谈判
item.description:
Papua New Guinea Prime Minister James Marape said on Monday the Pacific Islands nation, which he sees as a buffer between Asia and the Pacific, had not held talks with China on security after signing a security agreement with neighbour Australia last week.翻译:巴布亚新几内亚总理詹姆斯·马拉佩周一表示，这个被他视为亚洲与太平洋地区之间缓冲地带的太平洋岛国在上周与邻国澳大利亚签署安全协议后，尚未与中国就安全问题进行会谈。

Marape said that Papua New Guinea had been transparent, and that when he visited Beijing this year with his ministers and met China's leaders "there was no conversation on security".翻译:马拉佩表示，巴布亚新几内亚一直是透明的，当他今年与部长们访问北京并会见中国领导人时，“没有就安全问题进行对话”。

"We keep them in the space of the economy, we went with traditional security partners for security," he told a resources investment conference in Sydney.翻译:他在悉尼举行的资源投资会议上表示：“我们将它们保留在经济领域，我们与传统安全合作伙伴一起寻求安全。”

Papua New Guinea signed a defence agreement with the United States in May, and struck a security deal with Australia last week that Marape said was focused on internal security, including boosting police numbers and the judiciary.翻译:巴布亚新几内亚于五月与美国签署了一项防务协议，并于上周与澳大利亚达成了一项安全协议，马拉佩称该协议的重点是内部安全，包括增加警察人数和司法部门。

"These two are complementary. External security with the USA, and internal security with Australia," he said.翻译:“这两者是互补的。美国的外部安全和澳大利亚的内部安全，”他说。

The resource-rich but largely undeveloped nation north of Australia is seeking to woo foreign investment and trade to boost its economy, amid an increasing jostle for influence in the region between the United States and China, which signed a security pact with neighbouring Solomon Islands last year.翻译:这个位于澳大利亚北部资源丰富但基本上不发达的国家正在寻求吸引外国投资和贸易以提振经济，美国和中国之间在该地区影响力的争夺日益激烈，中国去年与邻国所罗门群岛签署了一项安全协议年。

PNG is discussing a free trade agreement with China, which already buys half of PNG's produce.翻译:巴布亚新几内亚正在与中国讨论一项自由贸易协定，中国已经购买了巴布亚新几内亚一半的农产品。

Marape said improving security was important for foreign investors.翻译:马拉佩表示，提高安全性对于外国投资者来说非常重要。

Papua New Guinea's exports are dominated by resources and energy, including liquefied natural gas.翻译:巴布亚新几内亚的出口以资源和能源为主，其中包括液化天然气。

Marape said that he did not want to be lectured on climate change, and that nations with the biggest carbon footprints and affluent lifestyles needed to take the lead in curbing emissions.翻译:马拉佩表示，他不想接受有关气候变化的说教，碳足迹最大和生活方式富裕的国家需要带头遏制排放。

"My country is in the oil and gas business. Lucky for me we have the big forest and ocean to offset," he said.翻译:“我的国家从事石油和天然气业务。对我来说幸运的是，我们有大片森林和海洋可以抵消，”他说。

With 70% of Papua New Guinea forested, Marape said it was a "carbon negative" country and offered a green label to energy investors.翻译:巴布亚新几内亚 70% 的土地被森林覆盖，马拉佩称这是一个“负碳”国家，并为能源投资者提供了绿色标签。

In a separate speech to the Lowy Institute think tank on Monday, Marape said the greatest challenge facing humanity other than climate change is poverty, and economic investment was "more powerful than just security".翻译:马拉佩周一在洛伊研究所智库的另一次演讲中表示，除了气候变化之外，人类面临的最大挑战是贫困，而经济投资“比安全更强大”。

"The gap in poverty must be filled - the West cannot be ignorant to this," he said, adding that he believed the next 100 years would be the Asian century.翻译:“贫困差距必须得到填补——西方不能对此视而不见，”他说，并补充说他相信未来100年将是亚洲世纪。

He said PNG's security interests were different from those of smaller Pacific Island nations because of its geographic position, and PNG wanted to "share responsibility with Australia, to assist in keeping our Pacific safe".翻译:他说，由于其地理位置，巴布亚新几内亚的安全利益与太平洋小岛国不同，巴布亚新几内亚希望“与澳大利亚分担责任，协助维护太平洋地区的安全”。

"PNG stands as a buffer to greater Asia and linking to the Pacific," he said.翻译:“巴布亚新几内亚是通往大亚洲并连接太平洋的缓冲区，”他说。

Marape also said PNG was seeking to forge trade ties with India to ensure it had supplementary markets that would step up, in case "we get problems elsewhere".翻译:马拉佩还表示，巴布亚新几内亚正在寻求与印度建立贸易关系，以确保其拥有能够加强的补充市场，以防“我们在其他地方遇到问题”。

Reporting by Kirsty Needham in Sydney; Editing by Lincoln Feast, Christopher Cushing and Gerry Doyle翻译:Kirsty Needham 悉尼报道；林肯·盛宴、克里斯托弗·库欣和格里·多伊尔编辑
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 习近平访问期间，中国向越南提供铁路援助，推动数字丝绸之路
item.description:
China and Vietnam are set to agree this week on upgraded rail links and other infrastructure, possibly including digital projects, officials said, in moves that would bring Hanoi closer to Beijing as great powers jostle for influence in Vietnam.翻译:官员们表示，中国和越南将于本周就升级铁路和其他基础设施（可能包括数字项目）达成一致，此举将使河内与北京更加接近，因为大国都在争夺对越南的影响力。

The announcements are expected during President Xi Jinping's visit to Hanoi from Tuesday, the first in six years to the Southeast Asian neighbour, and shortly after U.S. President Joe Biden travelled to the Vietnamese capital in September to strengthen bilateral ties.翻译:预计这些消息将在习近平主席周二访问河内期间宣布，这是六年来首次访问这个东南亚邻国，也是在美国总统乔·拜登于 9 月访问越南首都以加强双边关系后不久。

China is ready to offer grants to Vietnam to boost the railway between Kunming and the Vietnamese port city of Haiphong, and other transport links from southern China to Hanoi, Vietnamese state paper Tuoi Tre reported, citing the Chinese ambassador to Vietnam Xiong Bo.翻译:越南官方报纸《Tuoi Tre》援引中国驻越南大使熊波的话说，中国准备向越南提供赠款，以加强昆明和越南港口城市海防之间的铁路建设，以及从中国南部到河内的其他交通联系。

He said China was ready to provide "non-refundable aid" for these projects, the paper reported late on Sunday, in an offer that, if confirmed, would represent a major concession to a country that is traditionally loath of taking loans.翻译:该报周日晚间报道称，他表示中国已准备好为这些项目提供“不可退还的援助”，这一提议如果得到确认，将是对一个传统上不愿接受贷款的国家的重大让步。

It is however unclear whether grants would come with loans and the share of both.翻译:然而，尚不清楚赠款是否会与贷款一起提供以及两者的份额。

A sizeable offer of grants could also be perceived as a blow to the United States and other Western backers of infrastructure projects in Vietnam, who under a climate plan have offered mostly loans at market values to help Vietnam reduce its coal use.翻译:提供大量赠款也可能被视为对美国和越南基础设施项目的其他西方支持者的打击，根据气候计划，这些国家主要以市场价值提供贷款，以帮助越南减少煤炭使用。

The Kunming-Haiphong rail upgrade plan, which Reuters first reported earlier in December, passes through the region where Vietnam has its biggest rare earths mines, which it has so far been unable to exploit because of a lack of processing technology.翻译:路透社12月初首次报道的昆明至海防铁路升级计划经过越南拥有最大稀土矿的地区，但由于缺乏加工技术，越南迄今为止无法开采该矿。

Vietnam is estimated to hold the world's second largest deposits of the strategic minerals which are at the moment crucial for electric vehicles and wind turbines.翻译:据估计，越南拥有世界第二大战略矿产储量，这些矿产目前对电动汽车和风力涡轮机至关重要。

China is by far the world's biggest producer and refiner of rare earths, but is unclear what deal could be reached on that, as Beijing is usually reluctant to share its refining technology and Hanoi largely prevents export of unprocessed rare earths.翻译:中国是迄今为止世界上最大的稀土生产国和精炼国，但尚不清楚能否就此达成什么协议，因为北京通常不愿分享其精炼技术，而河内则在很大程度上阻止未加工稀土的出口。

Vietnam's foreign affairs ministry did not reply on Monday to a request for comment about the possible grants, but Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh in November supported the upgrade of the Kunming-Haiphong rail.

DIGITAL SILK ROAD

China's ambassador also mentioned digital interconnections among the priorities to strengthen cooperation between the two countries, which are already enjoying booming economic exchanges.翻译:中国大使还提到，数字互联是两国加强合作的优先事项之一，两国经济交流已经蓬勃发展。

"Both of our countries need to enhance interconnections on land, sea, air and on the internet," Xiong Bo was reported saying.翻译:据报道，熊波表示：“我们两国都需要加强陆地、海洋、空中和互联网上的互联互通。”

Diplomats, officials and Vietnamese experts said digital interconnections meant including Vietnam in Chinese plans for a Digital Silk Road, Beijing's flagship programme under the wider Belt and Road Initiative focussed on optical fibre cables, data centres and other telecoms infrastructure in friendly countries.翻译:外交官、官员和越南专家表示，数字互联意味着将越南纳入中国的数字丝绸之路计划，这是北京在更广泛的“一带一路”倡议下的旗舰计划，重点关注友好国家的光纤电缆、数据中心和其他电信基础设施。

Additional submarine cables could be part of the discussion, one diplomat said, as Vietnam has experienced disruptions this year in its undersea digital infrastructure. Vietnam also plans to build a fully-fledged 5G network, an infrastructure in which China's telecom giant Huawei excels.翻译:一位外交官表示，由于越南今年的海底数字基础设施出现中断，因此可能会讨论增加海底电缆。越南还计划建设成熟的5G网络，这是中国电信巨头华为擅长的基础设施。

Vietnam's foreign ministry did not comment on Monday but President Vo Van Thuong at the Belt and Road forum in China in October urged to boost cooperation on digital infrastructure.翻译:越南外交部周一没有发表评论，但越南国家主席武文上在 10 月份中国“一带一路”论坛上敦促加强数字基础设施合作。

It is however unclear whether Vietnam is only paying lip service to that, as national security concerns tend to prevail on strategic projects, said Le Hong Hiep, a senior fellow at Singapore's Iseas–Yusof Ishak Institute, especially in the South China Sea, where Hanoi and Beijing disagree over borders.翻译:新加坡尤索夫伊萨研究所高级研究员 Le Hong Hiep 表示，目前还不清楚越南是否只是口头上说说而已，因为国家安全问题往往在战略项目上占主导地位，特别是在南中国海，河内和北京在边界问题上存在分歧。

item.title: 香港“只有爱国者”选举表现平平，投票率创历史新低
item.description:
A "patriots only" district election in Hong Kong that barred opposition democrats from the ballot sheet amid a national security squeeze had a record low voter turnout of 27.5% as many voters spurned what was seen as an undemocratic poll.翻译:在国家安全压力下，香港举行的“仅限爱国者”区选举禁止反对派民主党人参与投票，投票率创历史新低，仅为 27.5%，因为许多选民拒绝接受被视为不民主的民意调查。

The sharp slide in turnout since the last such election in 2019 comes after Beijing imposed a sweeping national security law that has been used to clamp down on dissent, and overhauled the electoral system to shut out democrats and other liberals.翻译:自2019年上次此类选举以来，投票率大幅下滑，此前北京实施了一项全面的国家安全法，该法用于压制异见，并彻底改革了选举制度以将民主党人和其他自由派人士拒之门外。

"It can be seen that everyone has begun to feel that the election has no meaning," said Lemon Wong, one of the few remaining democrats still involved in local politics.翻译:“可以看出，每个人都开始觉得选举没有意义，”仅存的少数仍参与当地政治的民主党人之一莱蒙·黄(Lemon Wong)说。

"Even pro-establishment supporters are asking themselves why they need to vote because it's all the same."翻译:“即使是建制派的支持者也在问自己为什么需要投票，因为都是一样的。”

The previous lowest turnout was 35.8% in 1999. Four years ago at the last such election during Hong Kong's mass pro-democracy protests, a record 71% turnout brought about a landslide victory for the democratic camp in a fiercely contested poll.翻译:此前的最低投票率是1999年的35.8%。四年前，在香港大规模民主抗议期间的最后一次此类选举中，创纪录的71%投票率在一场激烈的民意调查中为民主阵营带来了压倒性胜利。

For this election, directly elected seats were slashed by nearly 80%, while all candidates were required to undergo national security background checks and secure nominations from two pro-government committees.翻译:这次选举，直选席位被削减近80%，所有候选人都必须接受国家安全背景调查，并获得两个亲政府委员会的提名。

At least three pro-democracy and non pro-establishment groups, including moderates, and even some pro-Beijing figures failed to meet those thresholds.翻译:至少三个亲民主和非建制派团体，包括温和派，甚至一些亲北京人士未能达到这些门槛。

An unprecedented electronic poll register system failure caused some disruptions and an eventual switch to a manual system, with polling times extended by 90 minutes till midnight.翻译:前所未有的电子投票登记系统故障造成了一些干扰，最终切换到手动系统，投票时间延长了 90 分钟，直到午夜。

The electoral commission said the extension wasn't linked at all to the turnout rate.翻译:选举委员会表示，延期与投票率完全无关。

Security was tight, with over ten thousand police deployed. At least six people were arrested for alleged offences including posting online for people to cast invalid ballots, or to incite others to disrupt the polls, according to statements from the police and the city's anti-corruption authority.

"BIRDCAGE" ELECTION

Three members of the "League of Social Democrats" were among those followed and arrested just before they planned to protest against what they described as a "birdcage election" and a "big leap backwards" for electoral and democratic rights.翻译:“社会民主党联盟”的三名成员在计划抗议他们所说的“鸟笼选举”以及选举和民主权利的“大倒退”之前遭到跟踪和逮捕。

The police said in a statement the three were arrested on suspicion of attempting to "incite others" to disrupt the poll.翻译:警方在一份声明中表示，三人因涉嫌试图“煽动他人”扰乱投票而被捕。

Hong Kong's leader John Lee, who had sought in recent weeks to rally public support for the polls, again defended their legitimacy given a need to secure stability in Hong Kong that returned from British to Chinese rule in 1997.翻译:香港领导人李家超最近几周一直在寻求争取公众对这次民意调查的支持，鉴于需要确保1997年从英国回归中国统治的香港的稳定，他再次捍卫了民意调查的合法性。

"It is the last piece of the puzzle for us to implement the principles of patriots governing Hong Kong," Lee said after casting his vote. He added that the 2019 election had been used to sabotage governance and endanger national security.翻译:李在投票后表示：“这是我们落实爱国者治港原则的最后一块拼图。”他补充说，2019 年选举被用来破坏治理并危害国家安全。

While some western governments have been critical of Hong Kong's authoritarian turn under the national security law, China says it has brought stability to the financial hub after protracted pro-democracy protests in 2019.翻译:尽管一些西方政府一直批评香港根据国家安全法转向独裁，但中国表示，在 2019 年旷日持久的民主抗议活动之后，该法为这个金融中心带来了稳定。

item.title: 中国消费价格创三年来最快跌幅 工厂门口通货紧缩加深
item.description:
Summary:
  • Nov CPI -0.5% y/y vs -0.2% in Oct
  • Nov CPI -0.5% m/m vs -0.1% in Oct
  • Nov PPI -3.0% y/y vs -2.6% in Oct
翻译:概括：
  • 11 月 CPI 同比为 -0.5%，10 月为 -0.2%
  • 11 月 CPI 环比为 -0.5%，10 月为 -0.1%
  • 11 月 PPI 同比为 -3.0%，10 月为 -2.6%

China's consumer prices fell the fastest in three years in November while factory-gate deflation deepened, indicating rising deflationary pressures as weak domestic demand casts doubt over the economic recovery.翻译:11月份，中国居民消费价格创三年来最快跌幅，工厂通货紧缩加剧，内需疲弱令经济复苏疑虑，通货紧缩压力加大。

The consumer price index (CPI) dropped 0.5% both from a year earlier and compared with October, data from the National Bureau of Statistics (NBS) showed on Saturday.翻译:国家统计局周六公布的数据显示，居民消费价格指数（CPI）同比下降0.5%，环比下降0.5%。

That was deeper than the median forecasts in a Reuters poll of 0.1% declines both year-on-year and month-on-month. The year-on-year CPI decline was the steepest since November 2020.翻译:这比路透社调查中预测的同比和环比下降 0.1% 的预测还要深。 CPI同比降幅创2020年11月以来最大。

The numbers add to recent mixed trade data and manufacturing surveys that have kept alive calls for further policy support to shore up growth.翻译:这些数字与最近的混合贸易数据和制造业调查相结合，使人们不断呼吁进一步提供政策支持以支撑经济增长。

Xu Tianchen, senior economist at the Economist Intelligence Unit, said the data would be alarming for policymakers and cited three main factors behind it: falling global energy prices, the fading of the winter travel boom and a chronic supply glut.翻译:经济学人智库高级经济学家徐天辰表示，这些数据对政策制定者来说令人震惊，并列举了其背后的三个主要因素：全球能源价格下跌、冬季旅游热潮消退以及长期供应过剩。

"Downward pressure will continue to rise in 2024 as developers and local governments continue to deleverage and as global growth is expected to slow," Xu said.翻译:徐说：“随着开发商和地方政府继续去杠杆化以及全球经济增长预计放缓，2024年下行压力将继续加大。”

Year-on-year core inflation, excluding food and fuel prices, was 0.6%, the same as October.翻译:不包括食品和燃料价格的核心通胀同比为0.6%，与10月份持平。

Bruce Pang, chief economist at Jones Lang Lasalle, said the weak core CPI reading was a warning about persistently sluggish demand, which should be a policy priority for China if it is to deliver more sustainable and balanced growth.翻译:仲量联行首席经济学家布鲁斯·庞表示，疲弱的核心消费者物价指数是对需求持续低迷的警告，如果中国要实现更加可持续和平衡的增长，这应该是中国的政策重点。

Although consumer prices in the world's second-biggest economy have been teetering on the edge of deflation in recent months, China's central bank Governor Pan Gongsheng said last week inflation was expected to be "going upwards".翻译:尽管近几个月来世界第二大经济体的消费者价格一直在通货紧缩的边缘徘徊，但中国央行行长潘功胜上周表示， 通胀预计将“上升”。

The producer price index (PPI) fell 3.0% year-on-year against a 2.6% drop in October, marking the 14th straight month of decline and the quickest since August. Economists had predicted a 2.8% fall in November.翻译:生产者出厂价格指数（PPI）同比下降3.0%，10月份下降2.6%，连续第14个月下降，创8月份以来最大跌幅。经济学家此前预测 11 月份将下降 2.8%。

China's economy has grappled with multiple headwinds this year, including mounting local government debt, an ailing housing market and tepid demand at home and abroad. Chinese consumers especially have been tightening their purse strings, wary of uncertainties in the elusive economic recovery.翻译:今年中国经济面临多重阻力，包括地方政府债务增加、房地产市场低迷以及国内外需求不温不火。中国消费者尤其一直在勒紧钱包，对难以捉摸的经济复苏的不确定性保持警惕。

Moody's on Tuesday issued a downgrade warning on China's credit rating, saying costs to bail out local governments and state firms and to control the property crisis would weigh on the economy.翻译:穆迪周二对中国信用评级发出下调警告，称救助地方政府和国有企业以及控制房地产危机的成本将给经济带来压力。

China's finance ministry called the decision disappointing, saying the economy would rebound and risks were controllable.翻译:中国财政部称这一决定令人失望，并表示经济将会反弹，风险可控。

The authorities will spur domestic demand and enhance economic recovery in 2024, the Politburo, a top decision-making body of the ruling Communist Party, was quoted by state media as saying on Friday.翻译:官方媒体周五援引执政共产党最高决策机构政治局的话说，当局将在 2024 年刺激内需并促进经济复苏。

Markets are awaiting more government stimulus at the annual agenda-setting "Central Economic Work Conference" later this month.翻译:市场正在等待本月晚些时候召开的年度议程“中央经济工作会议”上政府出台更多刺激措施。

Reporting by Ellen Zhang, Ella Cao and Ryan Woo; Editing by William Mallard and Edmund Klamann翻译:张艾伦、曹艾拉、吴瑞安报道；威廉·马拉德和埃德蒙·克拉曼编辑

item.title: 中国提议削减共同基金交易成本以规范佣金
item.description:
China's securities regulator has published draft rules aimed at cutting trading commissions for mutual funds and addressing the conflict of interest between the securities trading and fund sales businesses of brokerages, the latest reform to the $3.8 trillion mutual fund industry.翻译:中国证券监管机构发布了规则草案，旨在削减共同基金的交易佣金并解决券商证券交易和基金销售业务之间的利益冲突，这是对规模达3.8万亿美元的共同基金行业的最新改革。

The China Securities Regulatory Commission (CSRC) said the proposals were designed to protect investors and better regulate the way fund managers allocate trading commissions.翻译:中国证监会表示，这些建议旨在保护投资者并更好地规范基金管理人分配交易佣金的方式。

The rules, published by the CSRC for public consultation on Friday, are the latest attempt by authorities to revive confidence in the sluggish stock market and comes five months after the regulator urged mutual funds to cut management fees and reduce costs for investors.翻译:中国证监会周五公布的这些规定征求公众意见，是当局为重振低迷股市信心而做出的最新尝试，五个月前，该监管机构敦促共同基金削减管理费，降低投资者成本。

Analysts say the new rules would help brokerages with strong trading and research capabilities to win commissions.翻译:分析师表示，新规则将帮助拥有强大交易和研究能力的券商赢得佣金。

According to the draft rules, trading commissions would be reduced for both passive and active fund products. SWS Research estimates that overall commissions would be cut by a third.翻译:根据规则草案，被动型和主动型基金产品的交易佣金都将降低。 SWS Research 估计整体佣金将减少三分之一。

In addition, fund managers are banned from paying trading commissions to buy third-party services such as external expert consultancy, financial terminals or databases.翻译:此外，基金管理人不得支付交易佣金购买外部专家咨询、金融终端或数据库等第三方服务。

Market participants say it is common for mutual funds to pay brokers additional commissions for dispensable services, pushing up trading costs for fund investors.翻译:市场参与者表示，共同基金向经纪人支付可有可无的服务的额外佣金是很常见的，这推高了基金投资者的交易成本。

The draft rules require the sales team of mutual funds not to participate in choosing a broker and allocating trading commissions.翻译:规则草案要求共同基金销售团队不参与经纪商的选择和交易佣金的分配。

The proposed rules also require that a mutual fund company must not pay more than 15% of its total trading commissions to a single brokerage, the CSRC said, adding that fund managers should choose brokerages that are "financially sound, well-behaved and have strong capabilities in trading and research".翻译:证监会表示，拟议规则还要求基金公司向单一券商支付的佣金不得超过其交易佣金总额的15%，并补充说基金管理人应选择“财务稳健、行为规范、实力雄厚的券商”。贸易和研究能力”。

The rules "will guide the brokerage business back to its root, back to research", Founder Securities said.翻译:方正证券表示，这些规则“将引导经纪业务回归本源，回归研究”。

Kaiyuan Securities expects the CSRC to tighten regulation over fund distribution fees in the next stage of the reform.翻译:开元证券预计证监会在下一阶段的改革中将加强对基金销售费用的监管。

Separately, the CSRC published draft rules to tighten scrutiny of China's $2.9 trillion private funds, in an effort to reduce risk in a sector key to innovation and economic growth.翻译:另外，中国证监会发布了加强对中国 2.9 万亿美元私募基金的审查的规则草案，以降低这个对创新和经济增长至关重要的行业的风险。

A qualified investor in a private equity or venture capital fund must put up at least 3 million yuan ($418,731), tripling the current threshold, according to the proposed rules.翻译:根据拟议规则，私募股权或风险投资基金的合格投资者必须至少投入 300 万元人民币（418,731 美元），是当前门槛的三倍。

($1 = 7.1645 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.1645 人民币）

Reporting by Shanghai Newsroom; editing by Miral Fahmy and David Goodman 翻译:上海新闻编辑室报道；米拉尔·法赫米和大卫·古德曼编辑

item.title: 菲律宾和中国就南海碰撞问题相互指责
item.description:
The Philippines and China traded accusations on Sunday over a collision of their vessels near a disputed shoal in the South China Sea as tensions over claims in the vital waterway escalate.翻译:周日，菲律宾和中国就两国船只在南海争议浅滩附近发生的相撞事件互相指责，因为围绕这条重要航道的主权主张导致的紧张局势不断升级。

The Philippine coast guard accused China of firing water cannons and ramming resupply vessels and a coast guard ship, causing "serious engine damage" to one, while China's coast guard said the Philippine vessel intentionally rammed its ship.翻译:菲律宾海警指责中国发射水炮并撞击补给船和一艘海警船，造成其中一艘“发动机严重损坏”，而中国海警则表示菲律宾船只故意撞击其船只。

China claims almost the entire South China Sea, a conduit for more than $3 trillion of annual ship-borne commerce, including parts claimed by the Philippines, Vietnam, Indonesia, Malaysia and Brunei. The Permanent Court of Arbitration in 2016 said China's claims had no legal basis.翻译:中国声称对几乎整个南海拥有主权，南海是每年超过 3 万亿美元的船运贸易的通道，其中包括菲律宾、越南、印度尼西亚、马来西亚和文莱声称拥有主权的部分地区。常设仲裁法院2016年表示，中国的主张没有法律依据。

Beijing and Manila have been playing cat-and-mouse around the uninhabited Second Thomas Shoal in the Philippines' exclusive economic zone when the Philippines deploys resupply missions for Filipino soldiers living aboard an aging warship deliberately run aground in 1999 to protect Manila's maritime claims.翻译:北京和马尼拉一直在菲律宾专属经济区无人居住的仁爱礁周围玩猫捉老鼠的游戏，当时菲律宾为居住在一艘1999年故意搁浅的老化军舰上的菲律宾士兵部署补给任务，以保护马尼拉的海洋主张。

The shoal is part of what are known internationally as the Spratly Islands.翻译:该浅滩是国际上称为南沙群岛的一部分。

On Saturday, the Philippines accused China of "illegal and aggressive actions" by China for firing water cannon at a civilian-operated government fishing vessel, a move Beijing called legitimate "control measures".翻译:周六，菲律宾指责中国向一艘民用政府渔船发射水炮，这是“非法和侵略行为”，北京称此举是合法的“控制措施”。

In Sunday's incident, China's coast guard said in a statement that two Philippine vessels, ignoring repeated warnings, had "illegally entered the waters adjacent to Ren'ai Reef in the Nansha Islands without the approval of the Chinese government."翻译:在周日的事件中，中国海警在一份声明中表示，两艘菲律宾船只无视多次警告，“未经中国政府批准，非法进入南沙群岛仁爱礁附近海域”。

It said the Unaizah Mae 1 "made an unprofessional and dangerous sudden turn, intentionally ramming into China Coast Guard vessel 21556." It said the Philippine side bore full responsibility.翻译:声明称，“Unaizah Mae 1”“进行了不专业且危险的突然转向，故意撞向中国海警21556号船只”。声明称，菲律宾方面负有全部责任。

China Coast Guard spokesman Gan Yu called on the Philippines to stop its "provocative acts", saying China would continue to carry out "law-enforcement activities" in its waters.翻译:中国海警发言人甘宇呼吁菲律宾停止“挑衅行为”，称中方将继续在菲律宾海域开展“执法活动”。

Philippine coast guard spokesperson Jay Tarriela posted on the social media platform X that the "M/L Kalayaan suffered serious engine damage. Contrary to China Coast Guard disinformation, UM1 rammed by CCG vessel."翻译:菲律宾海警发言人杰伊·塔里拉(Jay Tarriela)在社交媒体平台X上发文称，“M/L Kalayaan号发动机严重受损。与中国海警的虚假信息相反，UM1被CCG船只撞毁。”

A Philippine government task force condemned "China's latest unprovoked acts of coercion and dangerous maneuvers against a legitimate and routine" resupply mission. China's action "puts into question and significant doubt the sincerity of its calls for peaceful dialogue", it said in a statement.翻译:菲律宾政府的一个工作组谴责“中国最近对合法和例行的补给任务进行的无端胁迫和危险举动”。中国在一份声明中表示，中国的行动“让人对其呼吁和平对话的诚意产生质疑和严重怀疑”。

The National Task Force-West Philippine Sea said a coast guard ship was towing the Kalayaan back to Palawan province and that coast guard vessel BRP Cabra had "suffered damage to its mast after being directly targeted by the full strength of the water cannon".翻译:西菲律宾海国家特遣部队表示，一艘海岸警卫队船只正在将“卡拉延”号拖回巴拉望省，而海岸警卫队船只“BRP Cabra”“在被全力水炮直接瞄准后，桅杆受损”。

U.S. Ambassador to Manila MaryKay Carlson posted on X that China's "aggression undermines regional stability in defiance of a free and open Indo-Pacific".翻译:美国驻马尼拉大使玛丽凯·卡尔森在 X 上发帖称，中国的“侵略破坏了地区稳定，无视自由开放的印太地区”。

Around 200 Philippine fishermen, youth leaders and civil society groups have joined a Christmas mission to the area, organised by the Atin Ito ("This is ours"), a civilian-led network asserting the country's rights in the South China Sea.翻译:大约 200 名菲律宾渔民、青年领袖和民间社会团体参加了由 Atin Ito（“这是我们的”）组织的圣诞节访问团，该组织是一个由民间领导的网络，主张菲律宾在南中国海的权利。

The group said on Sunday they have decided to cut short the journey and returned to El Nido town in Palawan province after the captain said it was "unsafe" to continue "due to the dangerous maneuvers conducted by several Chinese vessels". Earlier in the day, ten fishing boats have decided to pull out from the voyage due to safety concerns.翻译:该团体周日表示，在船长表示“由于几艘中国船只进行了危险的演习”，继续“不安全”后，他们决定缩短行程并返回巴拉望省的爱妮岛镇。当天早些时候，出于安全考虑，十艘渔船决定退出航行。

item.title: 香港活动人士在城市“鸟笼”选举中被捕
item.description:
Three Hong Kong pro-democracy activists were arrested on Sunday, just before voting began in a "patriots only" district election that has marginalised formerly popular opposition figures in the city amid a national security clampdown.翻译:周日，三名香港民主活动人士被捕，就在一场“仅限爱国者”的地区选举开始投票之前，该选举在国家安全打压中使香港以前受欢迎的反对派人物边缘化。

The pro-China government has been seeking to boost turnout, as some observers see large numbers spurning the polls, in contrast to the last council elections in 2019, during Hong Kong's mass pro-democracy protests, which drew a record 71% turnout and a landslide victory for the democratic camp.翻译:亲中国政府一直在寻求提高投票率，因为一些观察家认为有大量人拒绝投票，这与 2019 年香港大规模民主抗议期间的上次立法会选举形成鲜明对比，这次选举的投票率达到创纪录的 71%，民主阵营取得压倒性胜利。

Police arrested three members of the "League of Social Democrats" in the Central business district, the group said. It had planned to protest against the "birdcage election" that it said lacked any democratic scope, given vetting requirements by authorities that have effectively barred all democrats from running.翻译:该组织表示，警方在中央商务区逮捕了三名“社会民主党联盟”成员。它原计划抗议“鸟笼选举”，称其缺乏任何民主范围，因为当局的审查要求实际上阻止了所有民主党人参选。

"Hong Kong people's right to vote and to be elected seems to be absent," the group said in a statement, adding that they had been followed since leaving home in the morning.翻译:该组织在一份声明中表示，“香港人的选举权和被选举权似乎缺失了”，并补充说，他们从早上离开家起就被跟踪。

Police said in a statement that they had arrested three people on suspicion of "attempting to incite others to carry out acts that disrupt district council election". The three were detained for investigation.翻译:警方在一份声明中表示，他们以涉嫌“试图煽动他人进行扰乱区议会选举的行为”的罪名逮捕了三人。三人已被拘留调查。

Regulations introduced in July slashed the directly elected district council seats by nearly 80% from four years ago.翻译:7月份出台的规定将直选区议会席位比四年前削减了近80%。

All candidates must now undergo national security background checks and secure nominations from pro-government committees. At least three pro-democracy groups, including moderates, and even some pro-Beijing figures failed to secure enough nominations.

'HARD TO TALK ABOUT DEMOCRACY'

The changes further narrow electoral freedoms in the former colony that Britain returned to Chinese rule in 1997. The crackdown under a 2020 China-imposed national security law has led to the arrests of former district councillors and the disbandment of major opposition parties.翻译:这些变化进一步缩小了英国于 1997 年回归中国统治的这个前殖民地的选举自由。中国 2020 年实施的国家安全法的镇压导致前区议员被捕，主要反对党被解散。

"It is the last piece of the puzzle for us to implement the principles of patriots governing Hong Kong," Hong Kong leader John Lee said while casting his ballot with his wife, claiming that the previous poll in 2019 had been used to sabotage governance and endanger national security.翻译:香港特首李家港在与妻子投票时表示，“这是我们落实爱国者治港原则的最后一块拼图”，并声称2019年的上次投票被用来破坏施政和危害国家安全。

Security was tight around many polling stations with over ten thousand police deployed to maintain order.翻译:许多投票站周围戒备森严，部署了一万名警察维持秩序。

While some western governments say the China-imposed national security law has been used to crack down on dissent, China says it has brought stability to the financial hub after the protracted pro-democracy protests of 2019.翻译:尽管一些西方政府表示，中国实施的国家安全法被用来镇压异见，但中国表示，在 2019 年旷日持久的民主抗议活动之后，该法为这个金融中心带来了稳定。

For weeks the major pro-Beijing and pro-government parties have been out in force, campaigning and festooning streets with posters and flyers in a bid to bolster turnout. On Saturday night, a harbourfront carnival featuring fireworks and patriotic pop singers made last-minute appeals for people to vote.翻译:数周以来，主要的亲北京和亲政府政党纷纷出动，在街道上张贴海报和传单进行竞选活动，以提高投票率。周六晚上，一场以烟花为特色的海滨狂欢节和爱国流行歌手在最后一刻呼吁人们投票。

Some were not convinced.翻译:有些人不相信。

"The broad political spectrum of voices that we saw four years has all gone," said Tang, a 27-year-old who said she would boycott the vote, asking to be identified only by her family name.翻译:27 岁的唐表示，“我们四年来看到的广泛的政治派别声音已经消失。”她表示将抵制这次投票，并要求仅透露自己的姓氏。

Turnout was 15.47% at 2:30 p.m. (0630 GMT), down from 42% at the same time in the previous election.翻译:下午 2:30（格林威治标准时间 0630）投票率为 15.47%，低于上次选举同期的 42%。

"It's very hard to talk about democracy or democratisation anymore in today's Hong Kong," said Kenneth Chan, a political scientist at Hong Kong's Baptist University and a former pro-democracy lawmaker.翻译:“在今天的香港，很难再谈论民主或民主化了，”香港浸会大学政治学家、前民主派立法会议员陈启明说。

"What they're doing now is the installation of the so-called patriots-only governance structure."翻译:“他们现在正在做的是建立所谓的仅限爱国者的治理结构。”

Reporting by Jessie Pang, Joyce Zhou, Dorothy Kam and Edward Cho; Editing by James Pomfret and William Mallard翻译:Jessie Pang、Joyce Zhou、Dorothy Kam 和 Edward Cho 报道；詹姆斯·庞弗雷特和威廉·马拉德编辑

item.title: 德国汽车供应商采埃孚将提高在华销量份额
item.description:
German automotive supplier ZF Friedrichshafen (ZFF.UL) aims to significantly raise the share of sales from China until the end of the decade, a management board member told magazine WirtschaftsWoche.翻译:德国汽车供应商采埃孚 (ZFF.UL) 的一位管理委员会成员告诉《WirtschaftsWoche》杂志，其目标是在本世纪末大幅提高中国的销售份额。

Stephan von Schuckmann, ZF's board member in charge of the Asia-Pacific region, said China was expected to account for 30% of the group's sales by 2030, up from 18% in 2022.翻译:采埃孚负责亚太地区的董事会成员史蒂芬·冯·舒克曼(Stephan von Schuckmann)表示，预计到2030年，中国将占该集团销售额的30%，高于2022年的18%。

He also said that ZF would also raise the share of sales from deliveries to Chinese vehicle makers that export globally.翻译:他还表示，采埃孚还将提高向全球出口的中国汽车制造商交付的销售份额。

"Our sales share grows along with their export volume," von Schuckmann said, adding that along with Chinese carmakers came a growing expansion of Chinese suppliers which creates new competition.翻译:冯·舒克曼表示：“我们的销售份额随着出口量的增长而增长。”他补充说，随着中国汽车制造商的到来，中国供应商的不断扩张也带来了新的竞争。

His comments come as Germany is trying to actively derisk from China, its biggest trading partner, concerned about overexposure to what it says is a competitor and systemic rival.翻译:他发表此番言论之际，德国正试图积极规避其最大贸易伙伴中国的风险，担心过度暴露于其所谓的竞争对手和系统性竞争对手。

Von Schuckmann said it would be wrong to discard the threat, saying Chinese supplies could learn quickly and have more competitive costs structures.翻译:冯·舒克曼表示，放弃这一威胁是错误的，他表示中国供应商可以快速学习并拥有更具竞争力的成本结构。

"We can assume that the current competition we know from China will also spread to Europe. You have to take this development very seriously and adapt in order to survive."翻译:“我们可以假设，目前来自中国的竞争也将蔓延到欧洲。你必须非常认真地对待这种发展并适应才能生存。”

Reporting by Christoph Steitz, Editing by Louise Heavens翻译:克里斯托夫·施泰茨报道，路易斯·天堂编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 沙特投资部长会见中国工商领导人
item.description:
Saudi Arabia's investment minister met with China's commerce and industry chiefs in Beijing on Sunday and discussed expanding cooperation in trade, investment and technology, the Chinese ministries said.翻译:中国各部委表示，沙特阿拉伯投资部长周日在北京会见了中国工商领导人，讨论了扩大贸易、投资和技术合作。

China is willing to work with Saudi Arabia to jointly promote China's Belt and Road infrastructure investment program and Saudi Arabia's "Vision 2030" initiative, the ministry quoted Commerce Minister Wang Wentao as saying after the meeting with Saudi Investment Minister Khalid Al-Falih, adding that the two countries would also expand cooperation in energy and resources, infrastructure and technology.翻译:商务部部长王文涛在会见沙特投资大臣哈立德·法利赫后表示，中方愿与沙方共同推进“一带一路”基础设施投资计划和沙特“2030愿景”倡议。两国还将扩大能源资源、基础设施和技术领域的合作。

The Vision 2030 plan aims to diversify the economy of the world's biggest oil producer away from hydrocarbon income and includes big infrastructure projects and an expanded focus on the private sector.翻译:2030 年愿景计划旨在实现全球最大石油生产国的经济多元化，摆脱碳氢化合物收入，其中包括大型基础设施项目和扩大对私营部门的关注。

Al-Falih also met China's Minister of Industry and Information Technology Jin Zhuanglong.翻译:法利赫还会见了中国工业和信息化部部长金壮龙。

The ministry quoted Jin as saying that China was open to working with Saudi Arabia on new energy vehicles, aircraft, photovoltaics and artificial intelligence, as well as cooperating to safeguard global industrial supply chains.翻译:商务部援引金正恩的话说，中方对沙特在新能源汽车、飞机、光伏、人工智能等领域开展合作，以及维护全球产业供应链持开放态度。

China's ties with Saudi Arabia have deepened recently, with the Saudi energy minister declaring in June that his country would seek to collaborate, not compete, with China.翻译:中国与沙特阿拉伯的关系最近不断加深，沙特能源部长在六月份宣布，中国将寻求与中国合作，而不是竞争。

The relationship, anchored in hydrocarbon ties, has expanded, with the two countries signing a comprehensive strategic partnership agreement and a series of investment agreements in December 2022.翻译:以碳氢化合物关系为基础的关系不断扩大，两国于 2022 年 12 月签署了全面战略伙伴关系协议和一系列投资协议。

Reporting by Colleen Howe; editing by Miral Fahmy翻译:科琳·豪的报道；米拉尔·法赫米 编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国称化石燃料协议“并不完美”，但对COP28成功至关重要
item.description:
China's top climate diplomat on Saturday said a final agreement on fossil fuels at the United Nations COP28 summit was crucial - even if not perfect - but he declined to say whether the country could agree to eliminating coal, oil and gas entirely.翻译:中国最高气候外交官周六表示，在联合国 COP28 峰会上就化石燃料达成的最终协议至关重要——即使并不完美——但他拒绝透露中国是否同意完全消除煤炭、石油和天然气。

An agreement by the world's nearly 200 countries to eliminate fossil fuels - the main driver of climate change - has become the make or break issue on the negotiating table at the Dubai summit.翻译:世界近200个国家达成的一项消除化石燃料（气候变化的主要驱动因素）的协议已成为迪拜峰会谈判桌上的成败问题。

The Chinese climate envoy, Xie Zhenhua, told reporters in a briefing that without the fossil fuels agreement there was not much chance of success at COP28.翻译:中国气候特使解振华在新闻发布会上告诉记者，如果没有化石燃料协议，COP28 成功的机会不大。

China remains heavily reliant on fossil fuels, with coal still the country's largest energy source.翻译:中国仍然严重依赖化石燃料，煤炭仍然是该国最大的能源来源。

"The energy transition is extremely important... but this transition requires a period of pain. Each country has different national conditions," Xie said.翻译:“能源转型极其重要……但这个转型需要一段阵痛期。每个国家都有不同的国情。”谢说。

China wants a text that expresses the need to reduce fossil fuels as quickly as possible while at the same time allowing room for developing countries to maintain energy security and grow their economies.翻译:中国希望文本能够表达尽快减少化石燃料的必要性，同时为发展中国家维护能源安全和发展经济提供空间。

Asked about the language options on "phasing out" fossil fuels in the latest negotiating text, Xie said China was already consulting with other countries in order to find a solution.翻译:当被问及最新谈判文本中“逐步淘汰”化石燃料的措辞选择时，谢表示，中国已经在与其他国家磋商，以找到解决方案。

"We all want to work together to find a language that points in the right direction of further efforts and reflects inclusiveness to the utmost extent and is acceptable to all parties," he said.翻译:我们都希望共同努力，找到一种为进一步努力指明正确方向、最大限度体现包容性、各方都能接受的语言。”

He suggested that the terminology agreed by the United States and China during the Sunnylands meeting in November could offer a way forward. A target calling for the gradual reduction of fossil fuels in the global energy mix could also be an option, he said.翻译:他表示，美国和中国在 11 月Sunnylands 会议上商定的术语可以提供前进的方向。他说，呼吁逐步减少全球能源结构中化石燃料的目标也可能是一种选择。

The Sunnylands agreement does not include "phase out" but says that both sides should "accelerate renewable energy deployment in their respective economies through 2030 from 2020 levels so as to accelerate the substitution for coal, oil and gas generation".翻译:《Sunnylands》协议并未包括“逐步淘汰”内容，但表示双方应“在2020年的基础上，到2030年加快各自经济体可再生能源的部署，以加速替代煤炭、石油和天然气发电”。

China is working with all the major negotiating groups to find a solution, and a consensus must be found among parties with vastly different views, Xie said.翻译:谢说，中国正在与所有主要谈判小组合作寻找解决方案，意见分歧很大的各方必须达成共识。

"The positions on the issue are currently very antagonistic, and China is trying to find a solution that is acceptable to all parties and can solve the problems," he said.翻译:他说：“目前在这个问题上的立场非常对立，中方正在努力寻找各方都能接受、能够解决问题的解决方案。”

China supports global goals to triple renewable energy capacity by 2030, he added, but declined to say whether it would join more than 100 countries and sign a pledge to meet the target.翻译:他补充说，中国支持到 2030 年将可再生能源产能增加两倍的全球目标，但拒绝透露是否会与 100 多个国家一起签署实现这一目标的承诺。

The veteran envoy told journalists that in his 16 years as a climate negotiator, this was the hardest COP he had ever seen.翻译:这位资深特使告诉记者，在他担任气候谈判代表的16年里，这是他见过的最艰难的一次缔约方会议。

"The meeting that feels the most difficult is this year's. There are so many issues to settle."翻译:“感觉最困难的是今年的会议，有很多问题需要解决。”

Reporting by David Stanway Editing by William James and Clelia Oziel翻译:大卫·斯坦威报道 威廉·詹姆斯和克莱莉亚·奥齐尔编辑
item.author: David Stanway

item.title: 中国和日本就争议岛屿附近的对抗相互指责
item.description:
China and Japan accused each other of maritime incursions after a confrontation between their coast guards in waters around disputed islands in the East China Sea.翻译:中国和日本在东海有争议岛屿附近海域发生海岸警卫队对峙后，互相指责对方进行海上入侵。

China's coast guard said on Sunday that a Japanese fishing boat and several patrol vessels intruded the previous day into waters around the tiny islands, called Diaoyu in China and Senkaku in Japan.翻译:中国海警周日表示，一艘日本渔船和几艘巡逻船前一天侵入这些小岛周围海域。这些小岛在中国被称为钓鱼岛，在日本被称为尖阁诸岛。

The uninhabited islands are controlled by Japan but also claimed by China.翻译:这些无人居住的岛屿由日本控制，但中国也声称拥有主权。

China's coast guard said in a statement it had taken necessary measures in accordance with the law to warn away the Japanese vessels.翻译:中国海警在声明中表示，已依法采取必要措施，对日本船只进行驱离。

Japan's coast guard said on Saturday that two Chinese maritime patrol boats left Japan's territorial waters around the islands after receiving warnings. It said its patrol vessels were protecting a Japanese fishing boat that had been approached by the Chinese ships.翻译:日本海上保安厅周六表示，两艘中国海上巡逻艇在收到警告后离开了日本岛屿周围的领海。它说，其巡逻船正在保护一艘被中国船只靠近的日本渔船。

Similar incidents occurred in November and October.翻译:类似事件在11月和10月也发生过。

Asian maritime disputes involving China have been escalating. China and the Philippines traded accusations on Sunday over a collision between their vessels in a part of the South China Sea each nation claims, marking the second confrontation in as many days.翻译:涉及中国的亚洲海上争端不断升级。中国和菲律宾周日就两国船只在各自声称拥有主权的南海海域相撞事件相互指责，这是多日以来的第二次对抗。

Reporting by Colleen Howe in Beijing and Kevin Buckland in Tokyo; editing by Miral Fahmy and William Mallard翻译:科琳·豪 (Colleen Howe) 在北京和凯文·巴克兰 (Kevin Buckland) 在东京的报道；米拉尔·法赫米 (Miral Fahmy) 和威廉·马拉德 (William Mallard) 编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国表示，如果没有解决化石燃料问题，COP28成功的机会不大
item.description:
China's top climate envoy Xie Zhenhua on Staurday said there was little chance the COP28 climate summit would be called a success if nations could not agree to language on the future of fossil fuels.翻译:中国气候变化特使解振华周六表示，如果各国不能就化石燃料的未来达成一致，那么 COP28 气候峰会就不可能取得成功。

Asked if China supported a fossil fuel "phase out" he referred to the terms used in the 'Sunnylands' agreement reached with the United States last month. He said another option would be to gradually reduce the share of fossil fuels in the global energy mix.翻译:当被问及中国是否支持“逐步淘汰”化石燃料时，他提到了上个月与美国达成的“阳光之乡”协议中使用的条款。他表示，另一个选择是逐步减少化石燃料在全球能源结构中的份额。

He also said China supports efforts to triple global renewable energy capactiy.翻译:他还表示，中国支持将全球可再生能源产能提高两倍的努力。

Reporting by David Stanway, writing by William James翻译:大卫·斯坦威报道，威廉·詹姆斯撰稿
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 菲律宾谴责中国在南海针对渔船的行为
item.description:
Summary:
  • Water cannon damages Philippine fisheries bureau vessel
  • China took "control measures" on intruding ships -Chinese state media
  • Philippine vessels to launch Christmas gift-giving convoy in South China Sea
翻译:概括：
  • 菲律宾渔业局船只遭高压水枪损坏
  • 中国对入侵船只采取“控制措施”——中国官方媒体
  • 菲律宾船只将在南海启动圣诞送礼船队

The Philippines condemned China's "illegal and aggressive actions" in the South China Sea on Saturday, saying its coast guard had fired water cannon at a Philippine fisheries bureau vessel conducting a regular resupply mission.翻译:周六，菲律宾谴责中国在南海的“非法和侵略行为”，称其海岸警卫队向菲律宾渔业局一艘执行定期补给任务的船只发射了高压水枪。

The Philippine task force for the South China Sea, an inter-agency government body, called for China to stop its "aggressive activities" in the Scarborough Shoal, which is claimed by both countries.翻译:菲律宾跨部门政府机构南海特别工作组呼吁中国停止在两国均声称拥有主权的黄岩岛的“侵略活动”。

U.S. Ambassador to the Philippines MaryKay Carlson said in a post on the social media platform X that China's behaviour "violates international law and endangers lives and livelihoods."翻译:美国驻菲律宾大使玛丽凯·卡尔森在社交媒体平台X上发帖表示，中国的行为“违反了国际法，危及生命和生计”。

She said the U.S. stood by the Philippines in support of a free and open Indo-Pacific.翻译:她表示，美国与菲律宾站在一起，支持自由开放的印太地区。

China said earlier that it took "control measures" against three Philippine fishing vessels that had intruded into waters near Scarborough Shoal, state media reported.翻译:据官方媒体报道，中国早些时候表示，对三艘侵入黄岩岛附近海域的菲律宾渔船采取了“控制措施”。

The incident comes ahead of Dec. 10, when the Philippines plans to deploy a Christmas convoy of around 40 Philippine vessels to distribute gifts and other provisions to residents in Thitu island, the Philippines' largest occupied island in the South China Sea, and to troops garrisoned on an ageing warship in the Second Thomas shoal.

"DANGEROUS MANOEUVRES"

The Philippines task force said three fisheries bureau vessels were on a supply mission on Saturday to provide oil and groceries to more than 30 Filipino fishing vessels near the Scarborough shoal when they came under fire from Chinese water cannons at least eight times.翻译:菲律宾工作组表示，周六，三艘渔业局船只正在执行补给任务，为黄岩岛附近的30多艘菲律宾渔船提供石油和食品杂货，但这些渔船遭到中国水炮至少八次射击。

A fisheries vessel was "directly and deliberately targeted by the China Coast Guard," the task force said, causing damage to communication and navigation equipment.翻译:工作组表示，一艘渔船“遭到中国海警的直接、蓄意攻击”，导致通信和导航设备受损。

"To prevent the distribution of humanitarian support is not only illegal but also inhumane," the task force said, adding that China deployed boats to drive away Filipino fishing vessels awaiting supply, and to illegally install a floating barrier.翻译:该工作组表示：“阻止人道主义援助物资的分发不仅是非法的，也是不人道的。”他补充说，中国出动船只驱赶等待补给的菲律宾渔船，并非法设置漂浮屏障。

Chinese Maritime Militia vessels were also reported to have engaged in "dangerous manoeuvres" and deployed a long-range acoustic device that resulted in temporary discomfort and incapacitation to some Filipino crew, the task force said.翻译:该工作组表示，据报道，中国海上民兵船只也进行了“危险动作”，并部署了远程声学装置，导致一些菲律宾船员暂时感到不适和丧失能力。

The Scarborough Shoal is located within the Philippines' 200-nautical mile exclusive economic zone. Beijing seized it in 2012 and forced fishermen from the Philippines to travel further for smaller catches.翻译:黄岩岛位于菲律宾200海里专属经济区内。北京于 2012 年占领了该海域，并迫使菲律宾渔民前往更远的地方捕捞较小的渔获量。

China claims almost the entire South China Sea, a conduit for more than $3 trillion of annual ship-borne commerce, including parts claimed by the Philippines, Vietnam, Indonesia, Malaysia and Brunei. The Permanent Court of Arbitration in 2016 said China's claims had no legal basis.翻译:中国声称对几乎整个南海拥有主权，南海是每年超过 3 万亿美元的船运贸易的通道，其中包括菲律宾、越南、印度尼西亚、马来西亚和文莱声称拥有主权的部分地区。常设仲裁法院2016年表示，中国的主张没有法律依据。

Reporting by Neil Jerome Morales; Editing by William Mallard and Neil Fullick翻译:尼尔·杰罗姆·莫拉莱斯报道；威廉·马拉德和尼尔·福里克编辑

item.title: 贵州省钢棚倒塌造成六人死亡
item.description:
At least six people were killed and three injured after a steel shed collapse at a building materials plant in southwestern China's Guizhou province on Saturday, state media CCTV reported.翻译:据官方媒体中央电视台报道，周六，中国西南部贵州省一家建材厂的钢棚倒塌，造成至少六人死亡、三人受伤。

Construction was going on when the collapse happened at noon in Xishui county, Guizhou province, CCTV said, adding an investigation was underway.翻译:据央视报道，中午12点，贵州省浠水县发生塌方时，施工正在进行中，事故调查正在进行中。

The injured are being treated at the hospital, state media said.翻译:官方媒体称，伤者正在医院接受治疗。

item.title: 中国对台湾参加COP28提出投诉
item.description:
The Chinese delegation at COP28 on Saturday raised a complaint over what it said was unacceptable talk about Taiwan's participation in the U.N. climate summit by other countries.翻译:中国代表团周六在缔约方会议第二十八届会议上提出投诉，称其他国家有关台湾参加联合国气候峰会的言论是不可接受的。

"China has noted that during the meeting a handful of countries ignore the fact that Taiwan is an inalienable part of China and make noises about the participation by the Taiwan authorities in the COP," a member of the Chinese delegation said via a translator in the plenary hall.翻译:“中方注意到，会议期间，少数国家无视台湾是中国不可分割的一部分这一事实，对台湾当局参加缔约方大会发出噪音”，中国代表团一名成员通过翻译表示。全体会议厅。

"This is unacceptable," the delegate said, asking for their statement to be entered into the official record. The statement did not name the countries it was criticising.翻译:“这是不可接受的，”该代表说，并要求将他们的声明纳入官方记录。声明没有点名所批评的国家。

item.title: 对廉价中国电动汽车的恐惧促使汽车制造商竞相生产经济型汽车
item.description:
The rise of inexpensive Chinese electric vehicles has upped the pressure on legacy automakers who have turned to suppliers, from battery materials makers to chipmakers, to squeeze out costs and develop affordable EVs quicker than previously planned.翻译:中国廉价电动汽车的崛起加大了传统汽车制造商的压力，这些汽车制造商转向从电池材料制造商到芯片制造商等供应商，以挤出成本并比之前计划更快地开发价格实惠的电动汽车。

"Automakers are really now only turning to affordable vehicles, knowing they've got to or they will lose out to Chinese manufacturers," said Andy Palmer, chairman of UK startup Brill Power, which has developed hardware and software to boost EV battery management system performance.翻译:英国初创公司 Brill Power 董事长安迪·帕尔默 (Andy Palmer) 表示：“汽车制造商现在确实只转向价格实惠的汽车，他们知道自己必须这样做，否则就会输给中国制造商。”该公司开发了硬件和软件来增强电动汽车电池管理系统表现。

Palmer, formerly Aston Martin's CEO, said Brill Power's products could boost EV range by 60% and enable smaller batteries. The battery is an EV's most costly component.翻译:阿斯顿·马丁前首席执行官帕尔默表示，Brill Power 的产品可以将电动汽车的续航里程提高 60%，并实现更小的电池。电池是电动汽车中最昂贵的部件。

Fears of slowing demand because EVs are expensive has increased urgency to reduce costs.翻译:由于电动汽车价格昂贵而导致需求放缓的担忧增加了降低成本的紧迫性。

That urgency can be seen everywhere. Renault (RENA.PA) said last month it plans 40% cost reductions for its EVs to reach price parity with fossil-fuel models.翻译:这种紧迫感随处可见。雷诺(RENA.PA)上个月表示，计划将其电动汽车的成本降低 40%，以达到与化石燃料车型的价格平价。

Stellantis (STLAM.MI) is building a European plant with China's CATL (300750.SZ) to make cheaper LFP batteries and recently unveiled the Citroen electric e-C3 SUV, which starts at 23,300 euros ($24,540).翻译:Stellantis (STLAM.MI)正在与中国宁德时代 (CATL ) (300750.SZ) 合作建设欧洲工厂，生产更便宜的 LFP 电池，并于最近推出了雪铁龙电动 e-C3 SUV，起价 23,300 欧元（24,540 美元）。

Volkswagen (VOWG_p.DE) and Tesla (TSLA.O) are developing 25,000-euro EVs.翻译:大众汽车(VOWG_p.DE)和特斯拉(TSLA.O)正在开发 25,000 欧元的电动汽车。

Vincent Pluvinage, CEO of Palo Alto, California-based OneD Battery Sciences, said that on his recent visits with European automaker customers, every meeting started with the same refrain: "'Reducing costs is now more important than anything else.'"翻译:总部位于加利福尼亚州帕洛阿尔托的 OneD Battery Sciences 首席执行官文森特·普卢维纳奇 (Vincent Pluvinage) 表示，在他最近拜访欧洲汽车制造商客户时，每次会议都以同样的口号开始：“‘降低成本现在比其他任何事情都重要。’”

OneD adds silicon nanowires to graphite EV battery anode material to boost range and cut charging time, saving $281 - nearly 50% - versus using graphite alone for a 100 kilowatt hour (kWh) EV battery.翻译:OneD 在石墨电动汽车电池阳极材料中添加硅纳米线，以提高续航里程并缩短充电时间，与单独使用石墨制造 100 千瓦时 (kWh) 电动汽车电池相比，节省 281 美元（近 50%）。

This can reduce EV battery weight by 20% for the same range, Pluvinage said. General Motors (GM.N) is a OneD investor and customer.翻译:Pluvinage 表示，在相同续航里程下，这可以将电动汽车电池重量减轻 20%。通用汽车(GM.N)是 OneD 投资者和客户。

OneD has developed a manufacturing process on relatively inexpensive machinery used in the solar panel industry, as Pluvinage said automakers dislike complex, costly new processes. OneD's first test plant will open early next year.翻译:OneD 已经在太阳能电池板行业使用的相对便宜的机械上开发了一种制造工艺，正如 Pluvinage 所说，汽车制造商不喜欢复杂、昂贵的新工艺。 OneD 的第一个测试工厂将于明年初开业。

Hodenhagen, Germany-based Veekim has developed an EV motor with magnets using a form of ferrite, or iron powder, instead of rare earths, which five automakers and suppliers are testing for affordable EV projects.翻译:总部位于德国霍登哈根的 Veekim 开发了一种带有磁铁的电动汽车电机，使用铁氧体或铁粉代替稀土，五家汽车制造商和供应商正在测试经济实惠的电动汽车项目。

Legacy automakers want to cut rare earths use because China dominates mining and processing. Veekim CEO Peter Siegle said using cheaper ferrite and low-cost processes - including 3D-printed copper wiring - can cut an EV motor's price by 20%. Motors can cost more than 500 euros.

'ALL ABOUT THE COST'

It is not just startups seeking EV cost reductions.翻译:寻求降低电动汽车成本的不仅仅是初创公司。

Chip maker NXP (NXPI.O) is working with automakers to reduce the amount of electronic control units - or mini-computers - in EVs, which can number between 200 and 300, said Allan McAuslin, director of vehicle control and electrification.翻译:芯片制造商恩智浦(NXPI.O)正在与汽车制造商合作，减少电动汽车中电子控制单元（或微型计算机）的数量，其数量可能在 200 到 300 之间，车辆控制和电气化总监 Allan McAuslin 表示。

Siemens (SIEGn.DE) has developed software simulation called digital twins to halve expensive EV development time.翻译:西门子(SIEGn.DE)开发了称为数字孪生的软件模拟，可将昂贵的电动汽车开发时间缩短一半。

European automakers are reacting to the arrival of lower-cost EVs from China, whose makers are planning even cheaper models.翻译:欧洲汽车制造商正在对来自中国的低成本电动汽车的到来做出反应，中国制造商正在计划推出更便宜的车型。

BYD's (002594.SZ) Dolphin hatchback, for instance, starts in the UK at 26,000 pounds ($33,000), nearly 30% below the starting price for the VW ID.3 hatchback.翻译:例如，比亚迪(002594.SZ)的 Dolphin 掀背车在英国的起价为 26,000 英镑（33,000 美元），比大众 ID.3 掀背车的起价低近 30%。

But U.S. automakers, somewhat protected from Chinese EV imports by subsidies in the Inflation Reduction Act, also seek more affordable EVs.翻译:但美国汽车制造商在某种程度上受到《通货膨胀削减法案》补贴的保护，免受中国电动汽车进口的影响，他们也在寻求更实惠的电动汽车。

GM said it has saved billions partly by developing a more inexpensive battery pack with LFP batteries for its revamped Bolt EV, which will launch in 2025, two years earlier than planned.翻译:通用汽车表示，通过为其改进后的 Bolt EV 开发一种更便宜的磷酸铁锂电池组，该公司已节省了数十亿美元，该电动汽车将于 2025 年推出，比原计划提前了两年。

Ford (F.N) said it will cut costs partly through a 50% increase in "in-sourcing" of parts like batteries and inverters.翻译:福特(FN)表示，将通过增加 50% 的电池和逆变器等零部件“内购”来部分削减成本。

Premium automakers want lower costs for EVs, too.翻译:高端汽车制造商也希望降低电动汽车的成本。

Michigan-based Our Next Energy (ONE) is developing an "Ares" battery pack with cheaper LFP technology that should give automakers the same electric driving range for half the price and a "Gemini" pack for customers including BMW (BMWG.DE) that offers extended range and should cost $75/kWh compared with an average today of $130/kWh, CEO Mujeeb Ijaz said.翻译:总部位于密歇根州的 Our Next Energy (ONE) 正在开发一种采用更便宜的 LFP 技术的“Ares”电池组，该电池组将为汽车制造商以一半的价格提供相同的电动行驶里程，并为包括宝马(BMWG.DE)在内的客户开发“Gemini”电池组，首席执行官 Mujeeb Ijaz 表示，其续航里程更长，成本应该为 75 美元/kWh，而目前的平均成本为 130 美元/kWh。

Suppliers said automakers particularly like less expensive parts that also reduce production costs.翻译:供应商表示，汽车制造商特别喜欢价格便宜的零部件，因为这也能降低生产成本。

San Carlos, California-based CelLink has developed a laminate sheet to replace wire harnesses - labor-intensive to make and install - that can be installed by robots.翻译:总部位于加利福尼亚州圣卡洛斯的 CelLink 开发了一种层压板来取代线束（制造和安装需要大量劳动力），并且可以由机器人安装。

CelLink raised $250 million from investors last year and in May announced a $362 million U.S. government loan for its Texas factory.翻译:CelLink 去年从投资者那里筹集了 2.5 亿美元，并于 5 月宣布为其德克萨斯工厂提供3.62 亿美元的美国政府贷款。

Since opening that plant, said CEO Kevin Coakley, "We've gotten some form of a purchase order from basically every major automaker that's come through there."翻译:首席执行官凯文·科克利 (Kevin Coakley) 表示，自从该工厂开业以来，“我们基本上已经从所有经过该工厂的主要汽车制造商那里收到了某种形式的采购订单。”

Israeli startup Addionics has developed porous, three-dimensional copper and aluminium electrode battery materials that look like sheer silk scarves when held up to the light and use far less material - including 60% less copper.翻译:以色列初创公司 Addionics 开发了多孔三维铜铝电极电池材料，这些材料在光照下看起来像透明的丝巾，而且使用的材料少得多，其中铜含量减少了 60%。

Those electrodes provide faster charging and boost EV range by 30%, CEO Moshiel Biton said. But automakers are more interested in projected savings of up to $7.50 per kWh.翻译:首席执行官 Moshiel Biton 表示，这些电极可提供更快的充电速度，并将电动汽车续航里程提高 30%。但汽车制造商更感兴趣的是预计每千瓦时节省 7.50 美元。

"What we hear from carmakers today is, 'We don't need longer range, we want lower costs,'" Biton said.翻译:“我们今天从汽车制造商那里听到的是，‘我们不需要更长的续航里程，我们想要更低的成本，’”比顿说。

Reporting By Nick Carey in London and Paul Lienert in Detroit Editing by Ben Klayman and Matthew Lewis翻译:尼克·凯里在伦敦报道和保罗·利纳特在底特律报道本·克莱曼和马修·刘易斯编辑
item.author: Nick Carey, Paul Lienert

item.title: 习近平访问河内，中国对越南投资激增，美国支出下降
item.description:
Summary:
  • Xi's visit to follow Biden's in September
  • China (with HK) is top investor in Vietnam this year
  • U.S. investment, trade have so far dropped in 2023
翻译:概括：
  • 习近平继拜登之后于九月访华
  • 中国（与香港）是今年越南最大的投资者
  • 2023 年美国投资和贸易迄今均有所下降

Chinese investments in Vietnam have boomed this year in contrast to a slowdown in U.S. spending and trade, official data show, as the world's two largest economies vie for influence in the strategic Southeast Asian country.翻译:官方数据显示，今年中国在越南的投资蓬勃发展，与美国支出和贸易放缓形成鲜明对比，世界最大的两个经济体正在争夺这个东南亚战略国家的影响力。

The manufacturing hub stretching along the South China Sea is increasingly a key assembling link in global supply chains that often rely on Chinese components and U.S. consumers.翻译:沿着南中国海延伸的制造中心日益成为全球供应链中的关键组装环节，而全球供应链往往依赖中国零部件和美国消费者。

U.S. President Joe Biden achieved an upgrade of diplomatic relations with the former foe in a visit to Hanoi in September, after a year of intense diplomatic efforts to elevate the United States to the same tier as China in Vietnam's ranking.翻译:经过一年的紧张外交努力，美国总统乔·拜登在9月份访问河内时实现了与这个前敌人的外交关系升级，以将美国在越南的排名提升到与中国相同的级别。

China's President Xi Jinping will travel to Vietnam next week with the aim of further deepening ties. He may agree to declare that the two countries share a common destiny, diplomats said, which could be interpreted in Beijing as a formal upgrade of diplomatic relations.翻译:中国国家主席习近平将于 下周访问越南，旨在进一步深化两国关系。外交官们表示，他可能同意宣布两国拥有共同的命运，这在北京可能会被解读为外交关系的正式升级。

It is unclear which symbolic upgrade carries more weight, but in economic terms China appears to have had the upper hand so far, partly as a consequence of U.S. trade policy. Tensions between Washington and Beijing and various U.S.-led sanctions on China in recent years have encouraged Chinese investment in Vietnam.翻译:目前尚不清楚哪种象征性升级更具分量，但从经济角度来看，中国迄今为止似乎占据上风，部分原因是美国贸易政策的结果。近年来，华盛顿和北京之间的紧张关系以及美国主导的对中国的各种制裁鼓励了中国对越南的投资。

Registered investment from China and Hong Kong combined rose to $8.2 billion in the first 11 months of this year, according to Vietnam's official statistics, twice as much as in the same period last year when China had pandemic restrictions, making them the biggest investors in Vietnam.翻译:据越南官方统计，今年前11个月，中国内地和香港的注册投资总额增至82亿美元，是去年中国实施疫情限制期间同期的两倍，成为越南最大的投资者。

U.S. registered investment instead has fallen to $0.5 billion this year from $0.7 billion in 2022, making it the 10th largest investor after Pacific offshore centre Samoa and the Netherlands.翻译:美国的注册投资额却从 2022 年的 7 亿美元降至今年的 5 亿美元，成为继太平洋离岸中心萨摩亚和荷兰之后的第十大投资者。

Bilateral trade also dropped, as U.S. consumers grappled with a cost-of-living crisis this year and no tariff cuts were agreed during Biden's visit.翻译:由于美国消费者今年面临生活成本危机，而且拜登访问期间没有就关税削减达成一致，双边贸易也有所下降。

Exports from Vietnam to the United States plunged 15% to $79.25 billion in the first 10 months of the year, Vietnam data show, and U.S. imports fell as well.翻译:越南数据显示，今年前 10 个月，越南对美国的出口骤降 15%，至 792.5 亿美元，美国进口也下降。

In the same period Vietnam's exports to China increased by 5% to nearly $50 billion, although imports fell as Vietnam largely buys from Beijing components that are assembled for export to Western countries.翻译:同期，越南对中国的出口增长了 5%，达到近 500 亿美元，但进口有所下降，因为越南主要从北京购买零部件，组装后出口到西方国家。

Despite strong economic exchanges, relations with China are complicated by disputes over boundaries in the South China Sea. Anti-Chinese sentiment is also common among Vietnamese people, and it leads to frequent protests, including one in 2018 against the creation of special economic zones that could have benefitted Chinese companies.

DE-RISKING

The U.S. diplomatic upgrade came with the White House's pledges of more investments and easier trade.翻译:美国外交升级伴随着白宫承诺增加投资和更便利的贸易。

"Despite the fanfare during Biden's visit we have not seen so far a lot materialise," said Zachary Abuza, professor on Southeast Asian politics at the National War College in Washington DC, noting foreign businesses face significant challenges when investing in Vietnam.翻译:华盛顿特区国家战争学院东南亚政治学教授扎卡里·阿布扎表示：“尽管拜登访问期间大肆宣传，但迄今为止我们还没有看到太多成果。”他指出，外国企业在越南投资时面临着重大挑战。

Several Vietnam-based business consultants signalled an increase in U.S. investors' interest and noted that investment decisions take time to be made.翻译:几位驻越南的商业顾问表示，美国投资者的兴趣有所增加，并指出投资决策需要时间做出。

The parallel boom in Chinese investment, which excluding Hong Kong has nearly doubled this year above pre-pandemic levels to $3.9 billion, is partly explained by companies' de-risking strategies amid U.S.-China trade tensions, said Kyle Freeman, partner at business consultancy Dezan Shira.翻译:商业咨询公司合伙人凯尔·弗里曼(Kyle Freeman)表示，中国投资的同步繁荣（不包括香港）今年的投资额比大流行前的水平几乎翻了一番，达到39亿美元，部分原因是企业在中美贸易紧张局势下采取了去风险策略。德赞·希拉.

China's slowdown has also been a factor on investment decisions, said Chad Ovel, partner at Vietnam-focused private equity firm Mekong Capital. "(The) poor short to moderate-term macro outlook in China is motivating Chinese to find investment opportunities outside of their own country."翻译:专注于越南的私募股权公司湄公资本合伙人查德·奥维尔表示，中国经济放缓也是影响投资决策的一个因素。 “中国短期至中期宏观前景不佳正在促使中国人寻找本国以外的投资机会。”

item.title: 中国美容市场放缓，大品牌折扣并不能解决问题
item.description:
Expensive beauty hauls are a thing of the past for Evelyn Zhu. The Chinese branding professional says she now only spends on skincare essentials, joining millions of other consumers who have cut back on cosmetics in the world's second biggest market.翻译:对于 Evelyn Zhu 来说，昂贵的美容服务已经成为过去。这位中国品牌专业人士表示，她现在只在护肤必需品上花钱，加入了全球第二大市场数百万其他消费者的行列，减少了化妆品的消费。

"In recent years we all bought so many products," the 32-year-old from the affluent eastern city of Hangzhou said. "My bathroom cupboard is full, it's hard to say I need much more."翻译:“这几年我们都买了很多产品，”这位来自东部富裕城市杭州的 32 岁男子说。 “我的浴室柜子已经满了，很难说我还需要更多。”

This restraint, which has taken hold amid a slowing economy, spells bad news for global firms such as L'Oreal (OREP.PA), Estee Lauder (EL.N) and LVMH (LVMH.PA) who for years banked on China's $52 billion beauty market for growth.翻译:这种在经济放缓的情况下出现的限制，对欧莱雅(OREP.PA) 、雅诗兰黛(EL.N)和 LVMH (LVMH.PA)等跨国公司来说是个坏消息，这些公司多年来一直寄希望于中国的 52 美元。亿美元的美容市场增长。

Regional brands such as Japan's Shiseido (4911.T), which counted China as its top market for years, are also struggling.翻译:多年来将中国视为其最大市场的日本资生堂（4911.T）等区域品牌也陷入困境。

But while the economic woes have certainly weighed on sales, analysts say the main issue facing the multinationals is their slowness to adjust to the shifting priorities of consumers, who have become more discerning about what they buy and are increasingly finding that local brands are more suited to their needs.翻译:不过，尽管经济困境无疑对销售造成了压力，但分析人士表示，跨国公司面临的主要问题是它们适应消费者优先事项变化的速度缓慢，消费者对购买的商品变得更加挑剔，并且越来越发现本土品牌更适合。以满足他们的需求。

"What Chinese consumers are still keen to spend on are high efficacy products," said William Lau, chief executive of multibrand beauty retailer Bonnie and Clyde, which stocks luxury international brands including Chantecaille and 111skin.翻译:“中国消费者仍然热衷于购买高效能产品，”多品牌美容零售商 Bonnie and Clyde 首席执行官 William Lau 表示，该公司销售 Chantecaille 和 111skin 等国际奢侈品牌。

"What you're seeing is a downgrade in lifestyle-driven luxury and premium brands," he added.翻译:“你所看到的是生活方式驱动的奢侈品牌和高端品牌的降级，”他补充道。

Botanee Biotech's sensitive skincare brand Winona is one of the beneficiaries of this paring back.翻译:Botanee Biotech 的敏感护肤品牌 Winona 是此次削减的受益者之一。

The Chinese brand, which is priced at around the same level as L'Oreal products, is known for combating redness, a concern that marketing firm iResearch reported affects two-fifth of women. Analysts from CMB International estimate Botanee's revenue will grow almost 18% this year to 5.9 billion yuan ($824 million), with Winona responsible for most of these gains.翻译:这个中国品牌的价格与欧莱雅产品大致相同，以抗红血丝而闻名，营销公司艾瑞咨询报告称，五分之二的女性都担心红血丝问题。 CMB International 的分析师估计 Botanee 今年的收入将增长近 18%，达到 59 亿元人民币（8.24 亿美元），其中大部分收益来自 Winona。

By comparison, sales for the global beauty giants are expected to fall.

DEEP DISCOUNTS

An analysis from brokerage Jefferies showed first half China sales down 8% at LVMH's beauty division, while sales at Estée Lauder Companies, which counts on China for one-third of its business, fell 12 percent over the same period.翻译:经纪公司 Jefferies 的分析显示，上半年 LVMH 旗下美容部门的中国销售额下降了 8%，而三分之一业务依赖中国的雅诗兰黛公司同期销售额下降了 12%。

Shiseido reduced its full-year profit forecast in November on slower China demand, which has also been hit by a boycott by some consumer of Japanese products following the release of treated radioactive wastewater in August.翻译:由于中国需求放缓，资生堂在 11 月份下调了全年利润预期，而在 8 月份处理后的放射性废水排放后，一些日本产品消费者抵制日本产品也受到了打击。

L'Oreal, Estee Lauder and Shiseido did not respond to a request for comment.翻译:欧莱雅、雅诗兰黛和资生堂没有回应置评请求。

These results also come off the lower base of 2022, when the combined colour cosmetics and skincare markets in China lost 9.5% of their value, data from Euromonitor shows.翻译:Euromonitor 的数据显示，这些结果也是基于 2022 年的较低基数得出的，当时中国彩妆和护肤品市场的总价值损失了 9.5%。

While the market research firm expects growth of around 6% this year, it forecast won't get back to its 2021 market size of $54.4 billion until 2025.翻译:尽管这家市场研究公司预计今年的增长率约为 6%，但预计要到 2025 年才能恢复到 2021 年 544 亿美元的市场规模。

So far, the multinationals have responded to the slowdown by offering deep discounts of up to 40% and gifts during peak shopping events such as the annual online Singles Day festival, but analysts say the data shows even that isn't really helping.翻译:到目前为止，跨国公司已经通过在一年一度的在线双十一等高峰购物活动期间提供高达 40% 的大幅折扣和礼品来应对经济放缓，但分析师表示，数据显示，即使这样也没有真正的帮助。

Luxe skincare brand La Mer, which rarely discounts, gave so many gifts-with-purchase over Singles Day that every sale resulted in almost the same amount of product being given away.翻译:很少打折的奢华护肤品牌 La Mer 在双十一期间赠送了如此多的购物赠品，以至于每次销售都会赠送几乎相同数量的产品。

Independent data firm Syntun estimated that GMV, or gross merchandising volume, of beauty and personal care fell 6% year-on-year across all online shopping platforms. GMV is commonly used proxy for sales among e-commerce operators.翻译:独立数据公司Syntun估计，所有在线购物平台的美容和个人护理商品的GMV（商品交易总额）同比下降了6%。 GMV是电商运营商常用的销售额指标。

"The biggest global names have seen their Tmall GMV decrease by about 40% on average during 11.11," said Jacques Roizen, the Shanghai-based managing director of consulting at Digital Luxury Group, a digital agency for luxury brands.翻译:奢侈品牌数字代理机构 Digital Luxury Group 驻上海的咨询董事总经理雅克·罗伊森 (Jacques Roizen) 表示：“11.11 期间，全球最大品牌的天猫 GMV 平均下降了约 40%。”

"Now we see you don't have discounting as an acceleration lever you can press to go deeper or wider, because they're already maxed out," Roizen added.翻译:罗伊森补充道：“现在我们发现，你已经没有折扣作为加速杆了，你可以按下去更深或更广，因为它们已经达到了极限。”

Gregoire Grandchamp, co-founder of Next Beauty, a brand management partner for niche beauty players looking to grow in the China market, said the discounts offered by the beauty brands online this year have been "insane".翻译:Next Beauty 是寻求在中国市场发展的小众美容品牌的品牌管理合作伙伴，其联合创始人格雷瓜尔·格兰尚 (Gregoire Grandchamp) 表示，今年美容品牌在网上提供的折扣“疯狂”。

But while these larger brands are better able to compete online than smaller companies that lack their marketing budgets, they are not immune to the slowdown in demand.翻译:不过，尽管这些大品牌比缺乏营销预算的小公司更有能力在线竞争，但它们也无法免受需求放缓的影响。

According to Grandchamp, the sooner they adjust to China's new normal of single-digit growth rather than chasing the growth of yesteryear with brand equity-eroding discounts, the better.翻译:Grandchamp 表示，他们越早适应中国单位数增长的新常态，而不是通过削弱品牌资产的折扣来追逐去年的增长，就越好。

"I think the way groups like L'Oreal will react will be to say, Okay, maybe it's better not to have this euphoric growth, but to be more in a more rational market," he said.翻译:“我认为像欧莱雅这样的集团的反应方式会是说，好吧，也许最好不要出现这种欣喜若狂的增长，而是更多地处于一个更加理性的市场中，”他说。

($1 = 7.1608 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.1608 人民币）
